sys_alias_templates.dynamic_data_schema: { "connection_fields" : [ { "name" : "connection.name", "label" : "Connection Name", "type" : "text", "defaultValue" : "GitHub Target or Source Name", "hint" : "Display name for the Connection", "mandatory" : true }, { "name" : "connection.connection_url", "label" : "API Endpoint", "type" : "text", "defaultValue" : "https://api.github.com", "hint" : "Cloud, Enterprise Cloud: https://api.github.com | Enterprise: https://github.<company>.com/api/v3", "mandatory" : true }, { "name" : "connection.extended_attributes.type", "label" : "Type", "type" : "choice", "defaultValue" : "source", "hint" : "Marketplace Source: source | Marketplace Target: target", "mandatory" : true, "choices" : [ "source", "target" ] }, { "name" : "connection.extended_attributes.github_type", "label" : "GitHub Type", "type" : "choice", "defaultValue" : "organization", "hint" : "Marketplace Source: source | Marketplace Target: target", "mandatory" : true, "choices" : [ "organization", "user" ] }, { "name" : "connection.extended_attributes.github_name", "label" : "GitHub Name", "type" : "text", "defaultValue" : "ServiceNow-Marketplace", "hint" : "The name (as in the url) of the Marketplace Source or Target", "mandatory" : true } ], "credential_fields" : [ { "name" : "credential.api_key", "label" : "Access token", "type" : "password", "defaultValue" : "", "hint" : "Personal access token to access the source or target", "mandatory" : true } ] }
sys_alias_templates.name: Marketplace Client Configuration
